products.title: Bucket Hat
products.description: Cool and comfortable in any setting, wear our lightweight cotton bucket hat everywhere you go.

products.title: Cotton Sweater
products.description: This soft and lightweight cotton sweater is the perfect transitional piece. Pair it with our bucket hat for lazy days or layer over a polo shirt.

products.title: Knitted Hat
products.description: Take the casual approach with our stretchy soft knit hat, made using sustainable materials.

products.title: Puffer Jacket
products.description: Stay warm... Chic and functional, our puffer jacket is an essential piece for every winter closet.

products.title: Shirt Jacket
products.description: Stylish and comfortable, layer any outfit with our cotton-blend shirt jacket. The deep forest green tone looks cool whatever the season.

products.title: Utility Jacket
products.description: Soft and versatile, pair our utility jacket with your favorite sneakers and a classic polo shirt.
